pd: AI performance consulting website with interactive AI Readiness Scorecard. Lead-gen site for ClearForge — the full-stack AI performance firm combining management consulting with hands-on AI engineering. Serves mid-market companies ($5M-$500M) and PE portfolio companies.
sp: Build a best-in-class Next.js 15 website for ClearForge.ai — an AI consulting firm. Use App Router, Tailwind CSS, Radix UI, Framer Motion, Recharts, Lucide icons, React Hook Form + Zod. Dark mode default with light mode toggle. SaaS aesthetic (Linear/Vercel quality). Tagline: 'Strategy that ships. AI that performs.' Follow Vercel React Best Practices for performance. All pages must be mobile-first, Lighthouse 95+. NO stock photos — use abstract gradients, geometric patterns, and data visualizations. Color palette: Deep Navy #0F172A, Electric Blue #3B82F6, Emerald #10B981, dark backgrounds #0A0A0A/#111111. Typography: Geist Sans + Geist Mono. Every page has ONE clear CTA. The AI Readiness Scorecard is the crown jewel — 18 questions, 5 pillars, radar chart output, soft-gated results.

t.ti: AI Readiness Scorecard — Full Interactive Assessment
t.d: Build the AI Readiness Scorecard at /scorecard — the primary lead capture tool. 18 questions across 5 weighted pillars (Data Maturity 30%, Team Capability 25%, Process Documentation 20%, Tech Infrastructure 15%, Budget Alignment 10%). Multi-step form with progress bar, one pillar per step. Each question uses 1-5 Likert scale with custom radio buttons. After completion: instant results page showing composite score (0-100), maturity level, animated radar chart (Recharts), pillar breakdown with descriptions. Soft gate: show score and level free, require email for full report. Lead segmentation: auto-assign segment A/B/C/D based on score. Store results in API route (Supabase-ready). Beautiful results page with radar chart, pillar bars, personalized recommendations, and recommended ClearForge service.
